name: Blade Breaker: Sword Taker
description:
Bein' a samurai aint easy when you break every blade you use!

Blade Breaker: Sword Taker is the story of Giri, a young Oni who wishes to become a samurai!
Too bad she's too strong for her own good, every sword she uses just shatters like glass!
Break swords! Take swords! Break more swords!

In BB:ST, your sword will break every time you manage to hit an enemy. Steal swords from the enemy and make them your own!
Fight your way to victory, and claim the ultimate unbreakable blade!

This game was made for the GMTKJam, which has the theme of "Only Once".
BB:ST incorporates "Only One" through its unique weapon system. Each weapon you pick up can only be used only one time before shattering, and the game's loop is built around killing enemies and stealing their weapons.

The game can be controlled with keyboard or gamepad.

Thank you for playing!
